subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Rick Neuheisel, the most valuable player in U.C.L.A.’s 1984 Rose Bowl victory and a former assistant with the team, was hired Saturday as the Bruins’ 16th coach.
snippet: Rick Neuheisel, the most valuable player in U.C.L.A.’s 1984 Rose Bowl victory and a former assistant with the team, was hired Saturday as the Bruins’ 16th coach.
